column4: i have some problems with my sound device, the tracks r playing but i dont hear any sound
do you know what your sound device is?
open a terminal and type "lspci" no quotes, and see how its identifying your sound device
did you re-compile alsa like that thread said.
it was linked in the thread i sent you.
what is your sound device again?
do me a favor and run this command in terminal, and tell me the output....   cat /proc/asound/card0/codec#* | grep Codec
was i helping you with this earlier today?
well, i was helping someone w/ that chipset earlier, but they had an intel hda sound device.
well, i'm willing to try and help you to get it to work, but i won't guarantee sucess.
give me aboput 5min, i'll be back, gonna go get a drink..lol
no quotes, and you're forgetting the / again.... "/join #indygunfreak"
